title: Suomen Väylät EN

tooltips.legendHeader: The data displayed at this zoom level and their explanations

multipleLayersWarning: You are about to activate 10 or more maplayers and it might affect the performance of the service

0.title: Return to start view
0.text: The start view is a predefined view that shows waterways, the railway network and the road net-work throughout Finland.

1.title: Share page
1.text: You can share the current view of the map with a link directly to the selected service or by copying the link. The view retains the focus, zoom level, and selected materials and theme.

2.title: Info
2.text: Behind the info button you will find information about the application, operating instructions and contact information for sending feedback, for example.

3.title: Language
3.text: You can select Finnish, Swedish or English as the language of the map service.

mapLevelMenu.title: Map Level Menu
mapLevelMenu.subTitle: The map level menu opens at the top left. There are 3 tabs to choose from

tabsContent.materList: You can filter the material list by topic behind the filter button. You can search the map level by name by entering at least 3 letters in the search field.
tabsContent.themeLayerSelection: Selecting a theme displays the map layers defined for the theme and opens a menu for selecting map materials related to the theme. Some of the map materials have their own style for the theme. There can be only one theme at a time. When a theme is selected, you can also select map materials other than those defined for the theme in the All Levels menu. The theme closes with the theme marker at the top of the map.
tabsContent.selectedLayers: List of selected map levels on the map. You can change the order of the levels by dragging them from the icon on the right. The transparency can be adjusted with the slider and the level selec-tion can be deselected.

search.title: Search
search.content: The search opens in the upper right corner of the map using the magnifying glass button on the left. The Search function allows you to search for you and addresses by selecting the search you want to use from the drop-down menu. You can delete a search result from the map by tapping the trash in the search box.

measureTool.title: Drawingtools
measureTool.content: The measurement tools open from the drawing icon on the left. The tools can be used to measure length or area. the measurement results can be deleted from the map with the orange rubber but-ton.

setFullScreen.title: Expand
setFullScreen.content: The Expand button can be used to expand the Suomen Vaylat application to fill the entire screen.

zoomBar.title: Captions / Zoom Bar
zoomBar.content: You can open the zoom level and the map levels with their captions on the map at that zoom level from the caption icon at the bottom right. Map levels are listed at the top first. Selecting another scale from the zoom bar moves to the selected approach level.

appInfo.title: Sovelluksen tiedot
appInfo.headingText: Suomen Väylät on Väyläviraston avoimen datan paikkatietoaineistoihin perustuva karttapalvelu, joka on julkaistu vuonna 2022 ja se sisältää tällä hetkellä yli 270 tietolajia ominaisuustietoineen. Palvelua ja sen sisältöä kehitetään edelleen.
appInfo.mainText: Suomen Väylät karttapalvelun kautta on katseltavissa tiestötietoja valtion tieverkolta, rautatietietoja sekä tietoja vesiväylistä. Lisäksi omiksi kokonaisuuksiksi on koottu Väyläviraston infrahanketietoja sekä kansallisen tie- ja katuverkon tietojärjestelmän, Digiroadin, tietolajit. Palveluun on rakennettu valmiiksi useita teemakarttoja, kuten esimerkiksi Hankekartta ja Rautateiden verkkoseloste. Suomen Väylissä aineistoja voi hakea aineistojen nimen tai aihealueen mukaan sekä suodattaa aineistoja teemojen mukaisesti. Lisäksi karttapalvelusta löytyy erilliset osoite- , tiehaku ja metatietohaut. Suomen Väylät on käytettävissä sekä desktop- että mobiiliversioilla. Palvelua tuotetaan suomen-, ruotsin- ja englannin kielillä.  Palvelun käyttöohjeet löytyvät ?-painikkeen(linkki) takaa. Suomen Väylien operoinnista ja ylläpidosta vastaa tällä hetkellä Sitowise Oy.

subContent.0: Kielisyyksien Excel tuonnin ja viennin tuki

0.content: Kaikkia aineistoryhmiä ei ole käsitelty datan osalta

subContent.0: Tiestötiedoista puuttuvat selkokielisyydet ja kenttien priorisointi kohdetietoikkunaan
subContent.1: Inspire-aineistoista sekä digiroad-aineistoista puuttuvat kenttien priorisointi kohdetietoikkunaan

contactInfoFeedback.0: Sovelluksesta vastaa Väylävirasto ja sovelluksen toimittaa Sitowise Oy.

0.text: Lisätietoja Väyläviraston avoimesta datasta ja käyttöehdoista:

address.title: Search place
address.subtitle: Search by address, municipality or property identifier

error.title: Address search
error.text: No results were found for the address search.

selectedLayers.zoomInToShowLayer: Zoom in to see the map layer
selectedLayers.zoomOutToShowLayer: Zoom out to see the map layer

0.title: Hankekartta
0.description: Kartalla esitetään Väyläviraston investointihankkeet ja toteutukseen tähtäävät hankesuunnittelukohteet.

2.title: Siltarajoituskartta
2.description: Kartalla on esitetty painorajoitetut sillat ja alikulkujen rajoitukset. Rajoituksia voi poistua ja tulla lisää, joten karttaa kannattaa tarkastella usein. Muistakaa tarkistaa mahdolliset rajoitukset myös kunnista ja yksityisteiden tiekunnilta.

5.title: TEN-T verkosto
5.description: TEN-T-verkosto koostuu kahdesta tasosta: vuoteen 2030 mennessä rakennettavasta ydinverkosta (core network) ja vuoteen 2050 mennessä rakennettavasta kattavasta verkosta (comprehensive network). TEN-T ydinverkko keskittyy tärkeimpiin yhteyksiin ja solmukohtiin. Ydinverkon toteuttamista edistää käytäviin perustuva lähestymistapa. TEN-T-verkko kattaa kaikki liikennemuodot: maantie-, ilma-, sisävesi-, meri- sekä liikennemuotojen yhdistelyn mahdollistavat alustat.

qualityContent.qualityPassTrue: Dataset is conformant to the specification.
qualityContent.qualityPassFalse: Dataset is not conformant to the specification.

ucs2.label: UCS2
ucs2.description: 16-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

ucs4.label: UCS4
ucs4.description: 32-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

utf7.label: UTF7
utf7.description: 7-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

utf8.label: UTF8
utf8.description: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

utf16.label: UTF16
utf16.description: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

8859part1.label: 8859 Part 1
8859part1.description: ISO/IEC 8859-1, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 1 : Latin alphabet No.1

8859part2.label: 8859 Part 2
8859part2.description: ISO/IEC 8859-2, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 2 : Latin alphabet No.2

8859part3.label: 8859 Part 3
8859part3.description: ISO/IEC 8859-3, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 3 : Latin alphabet No.3

8859part4.label: 8859 Part 4
8859part4.description: ISO/IEC 8859-4, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 4 : Latin alphabet No.4

8859part5.label: 8859 Part 5
8859part5.description: ISO/IEC 8859-5, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 5 : Latin/Cyrillic alphabet

8859part6.label: 8859 Part 6
8859part6.description: ISO/IEC 8859-6, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 6 : Latin/Arabic alphabet

8859part7.label: 8859 Part 7
8859part7.description: ISO/IEC 8859-7, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 7 : Latin/Greek alphabet

8859part8.label: 8859 Part 8
8859part8.description: ISO/IEC 8859-8, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 8 : Latin/Hebrew alphabet

8859part9.label: 8859 Part 9
8859part9.description: ISO/IEC 8859-9, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 9 : Latin alphabet No.5

8859part10.label: 8859 Part 10
8859part10.description: ISO/IEC 8859-10, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 10 : Latin alphabet No.6

8859part11.label: 8859 Part 11

8859part13.label: 8859 Part 13
8859part13.description: ISO/IEC 8859-13, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 13 : Latin alphabet No.7

8859part14.label: 8859 Part 14

8859part16.label: 8859 Part 16

jis.label: JIS
jis.description: Japanese code set used for electronic transmission

shiftJIS.label: Shift JIS
shiftJIS.description: Japanese code set used on MS-DOS machines

eucJP.label: EUC JP
eucJP.description: Japanese code set used on UNIX based machines

usAscii.label: US ASCII
usAscii.description: United States ASCII code set (ISO 646 US)

big5.label: Big 5
big5.description: Traditional Chinese code set used in Taiwan, Hong Kong of China and other areas

confidential.label: Confidential
confidential.description: Available for someone who can be entrusted with information

secret.label: Secret
secret.description: Kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people

creation.label: Creation
creation.description: Date identifies when the resource was brought into existence.

publication.label: Publication
publication.description: Date identifies when the resource was issued.

revision.label: Revision
revision.description: Date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and improved or amended.

copyright.label: Copyright
copyright.description: Exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor

patent.label: Patent
patent.description: Government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery

patentPending.label: Pending patent
patentPending.description: Produced or sold information awaiting a patent

trademark.label: Trademark
trademark.description: A name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer

intellectualPropertyRights.label: Intellectual property rights
intellectualPropertyRights.description: Rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity

restricted.label: Restricted
restricted.description: Withheld from general circulation or disclosure

attribute.label: Attribute
attribute.description: Information applies to the attribute class

attributeType.label: Attribute type
attributeType.description: Information applies to the characteristic of a feature

collectionHardware.label: Collection hardware
collectionHardware.description: Information applies to the collection hardware class

collectionSession.label: Collection session
collectionSession.description: Information applies to the collection session

dimensionGroup.label: Dimension group
dimensionGroup.description: Information applies to a dimension group

featureType.label: Feature type
featureType.description: Information applies to a feature type

propertyType.label: Property type
propertyType.description: Information applies to a property type

fieldSession.label: Field session
fieldSession.description: Information applies to a field session

software.label: Software
software.description: Information applies to a computer program or routine

service.label: Service
service.description: Information applies to a capability which a service provider entity makes available to a service user entity through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour, such as a use case

model.label: Model
model.description: Information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object

tile.label: Tile
tile.description: Information applies to a tile, a spatial subset of geographic data

vector.label: Vector
vector.description: Vector data is used to represent geographic data

grid.label: Grid
grid.description: Grid data is used to represent geographic data

textTable.label: Text, table
textTable.description: Textual or tabular data is used to represent geographic data

stereoModel.label: Stereo model
stereoModel.description: Three-dimensional view formed by the intersecting homologous rays of an overlapping pair of images

farming.label: Farming
farming.description: Rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants. Examples: agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

biota.label: Biota
biota.description: Flora and/or fauna in natural environment. Examples: wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sealife, wetlands, habitat

boundaries.label: Boundaries
boundaries.description: Legal land descriptions. Examples: political and administrative boundaries

climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere.label: Climatology, meteorology, atmosphere
climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere.description: Processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

economy.label: Economy
economy.description: Economic activities, conditions and employment. Examples: production, labour, revenue, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

elevation.label: Elevation
elevation.description: Height above or below sea level. Examples: altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products

environment.label: Environment
environment.description: Environmental resources, protection and conservation. Examples: environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape

geoscientificInformation.label: Geoscientific information
geoscientificInformation.description: Information pertaining to earth sciences. Examples: geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth s rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, erosion

health.label: Health
health.description: Health, health services, human ecology, and safety. Examples: disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services

imageryBaseMapsEarthCover.label: Imagery base maps earth cover
imageryBaseMapsEarthCover.description: Base maps. Examples: land cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations

intelligenceMilitary.label: Intelligence military
intelligenceMilitary.description: Military bases, structures, activities. Examples: barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

inlandWaters.label: Inland waters
inlandWaters.description: Inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrographic charts

location.label: Location
location.description: Positional information and services. Examples: addresses, geodetic networks, control points, postal zones and services, place names

oceans.label: Oceans
oceans.description: Features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters). Examples: tides, tidal waves, coastal information, reefs

planningCadastre.label: Planning cadastre
planningCadastre.description: Information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land. Examples: land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership

society.label: Society
society.description: Characteristics of society and cultures. Examples: settlements, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, recreational areas and activities, social impact assessments, crime and justice, census information

structure.label: Structure
structure.description: Man-made construction. Examples: buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers

transportation.label: Transportation
transportation.description: Means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods. Examples: roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels, nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

utilitiesCommunication.label: Utilities communication
utilitiesCommunication.description: Energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services. Examples: hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks
